product.title: Add A Frame to your Oxford Pennant Camp Flag
product.description: Add a frame to your 16" or 18" x 24" camp flag! Frames come in black, white, and natural wood finish. Final dimensions: Our 16" x 24" flag measures 18" x 26" framed and 18" x 24" is 20" x 26" framed. Note: a frame must be purchased in the same transaction as a separate pennant. Email us if you want a frame for an existing Oxford flag. Currently the framing process takes approximately 10-15 business days as long as the camp flag is in-stock. Price includes UPS Ground shipping within the Continental US. International customers, please contact us for more info. All frames are final sale. * We also offer framing options for our pennants!
product.descriptionHtml:
Add a frame to your 16" or 18" x 24" camp flag! Frames come in black, white, and natural wood finish. 

Final dimensions: Our 16" x 24" flag measures 18" x 26" framed and 18" x 24" is 20" x 26" framed.

Note: a frame must be purchased in the same transaction as a separate pennant. Email us if you want a frame for an existing Oxford flag. Currently the framing process takes approximately 10-15 business days as long as the camp flag is in-stock.

Price includes UPS Ground shipping within the Continental US. International customers, please contact us for more info. All frames are final sale.

* We also offer framing options for our pennants!
